text: Ilhomjon Barotov (born 21 July 1999) is a Tajikistani professional football player who currently plays for FK Istaravshan. ==Career== ===International=== Saidov made his senior team debut on 15 October 2013 against Kyrgyzstan. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- !colspan=3|Tajikistan national team |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2013||1||0 |- |2014||0||0 |- |2015||0||0 |- |2016||0||0 |- |2017||0||0 |- |2018||0||0 |- |2019||4||1 |- !Total||5||1 |} Statistics accurate as of match played 19 July 2019 ===International goals=== :As of match played 10 July 2019. Tajikistan score listed first, score column indicates score after each Nazarov goal. {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |+ International goals by date, venue, cap, opponent, score, result and competition |- !scope=col|No. !scope=col data-sort-type=date|Date !scope=col|Venue !scope=col|Cap !scope=col|Opponent !scope=col|Score !scope=col|Result !scope=col|Competition |- !scope=row|1 |10 July 2019||TransStadia Arena, Ahmedabad, India||align=center|3||||align=center|2–0||align=center|2–0||Intercontinental Cup |} ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Tajikistani footballers Category:Tajikistan international footballers Category:Association football midfielders
